## StandardTechniqueParams.alphaMap property

URL or texture buffer that should be used as alpha map. See: https://threejs.org/docs/\#api/en/materials/MeshStandardMaterial.alphaMap

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
alphaMap?: string | TextureBuffer;
```
